Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that are immediately followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled' without any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' relative to the total number of activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' is followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and containing 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that complete within the standard reimbursement timeline (i.e., lead to 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' across all process instances
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in variants that include only one approval step before supervisor final approval
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' events associated with claim amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in comparison to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in the same budget context (case:BudgetNumber)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all approval-related activities (including 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs in variants that do not include any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities occurring in 2018 versus 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that occur after exactly one prior submission (i.e., no resubmission due to rejection)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of total approved pre-approver declarations ('Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER') that belong to the shortest successful variant: 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE -> Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER -> Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR -> Request Payment -> Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases
